      program combined
          implicit none
          integer, parameter :: max_tokens_required = 4
          integer :: n, m, i, k, count_opposite, count_tokens, total_ops
          integer, allocatable :: a(:)
          integer, dimension(4) :: tokens  ! we only need the first four tokens
          integer :: x1, y1, x2, y2, dif, j
          logical :: found_opposite

          ! Read n and then n integers
          read(*,*) n
          allocate(a(n))
          read(*,*) (a(i), i=1,n)

          ! If n==0, then ... but n>=1?

          ! Step 1: find index m (1-indexed) with max absolute value
          m = 1
          do i = 2, n
              if (abs(a(i)) > abs(a(m))) m = i
          end do

          ! Count opposite signs and also we will generate tokens until we have 4
          count_opposite = 0
          do i = 1, n
              if ( (a(m) >= 0 .and. a(i) < 0) .or. (a(m) < 0 .and. a(i) >= 0) ) then
                  count_opposite = count_opposite + 1
              end if
          end do
          total_ops = count_opposite + (n-1)
          tokens(1) = total_ops
          count_tokens = 1

          ! Now, we want to fill tokens(2:4) if possible.

          ! First: opposite sign operations
          found_opposite = .false.
          do i = 1, n
              if ( (a(m) >= 0 .and. a(i) < 0) .or. (a(m) < 0 .and. a(i) >= 0) ) then
                  ! We have an operation (m, i)
                  count_tokens = count_tokens + 1
                  tokens(count_tokens) = m
                  count_tokens = count_tokens + 1
                  tokens(count_tokens) = i
                  if (count_tokens >= max_tokens_required) exit
              end if
          end do

          ! If we haven't got four tokens, then do propagation operations
          if (count_tokens < max_tokens_required) then
              if (a(m) >= 0) then
                  do i = 1, n-1
                      count_tokens = count_tokens + 1
                      tokens(count_tokens) = i
                      count_tokens = count_tokens + 1
                      tokens(count_tokens) = i+1
                      if (count_tokens >= max_tokens_required) exit
                  end do
              else
                  do i = n, 2, -1
                      count_tokens = count_tokens + 1
                      tokens(count_tokens) = i
                      count_tokens = count_tokens + 1
                      tokens(count_tokens) = i-1
                      if (count_tokens >= max_tokens_required) exit
                  end do
              end if
          end if

          ! Now, if count_tokens < 4, then we don't have enough tokens
          if (count_tokens < 4) then
              write(*,*) -1
          else
              x1 = tokens(1)
              y1 = tokens(2)
              x2 = tokens(3)
              y2 = tokens(4)

              if (x1 == x2) then
                  dif = abs(y1 - y2)
                  write(*,*) x1 + dif, y1, x1 + dif, y2
              else if (y1 == y2) then
                  dif = abs(x1 - x2)
                  write(*,*) x1, y1 + dif, x2, y2 + dif
              else if (abs(x1 - x2) == abs(y1 - y2)) then
                  write(*,*) x1, y2, x2, y1
              else
                  write(*,*) -1
              end if
          end if

          deallocate(a)
      end program combined
